reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be a perfect fit with nice construction and true color accuracy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress!
items.body: Loved this dress! I got soooo many compliments on it. The color was beautiful. I was so happy I went with this green dress because everybody at the gala was wearing the same style but in black so it was nice to stand out. The length was perfect and the material was thick. It was super stretchy as well. I’m definitely keeping this stress for future weddings, and events. Read more
items.author: Yvonne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy!
items.body: Stunning! Comfortable and flattering! Fits true to size. Looks amazing on! The burgundy color is beautiful! I will probably order in another color as well! Get it! Read more
items.author: Angela Finnegan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Flattering, and Perfect for Events
items.body: I was really impressed with this Relipop off-shoulder dress. The fit is flattering, the ruching hides problem areas nicely, and the mesh sleeves add a classy touch. The material is comfortable and has a good stretch without feeling cheap. The high split gives it a sleek, elegant look that’s perfect for fall events, date nights, or anything a bit more formal. I bought a medium, I'm 5'3, 150lbs and it looked really nice but would look even better if I had shapewear on; however, its too snug for my personal liking, so I ordered the large to see how that will feel and look. Overall, it’s a beautiful dress that looks even better in person and the color is beautiful. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: DNooch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, so cute and flattering (even with my rectangular body shape)
items.body: Just got it. I am usually a medium in everything, so I ordered a medium and it fits perfect! There is a good stretch to it too, so it doesn’t seem like it will be too restricting on the dance floor. (Wearing to a wedding) Very soft, nice material. Could not see my underwear lines or anything else through the dress. I love how the shoulder part is naked with scrunch material, so you won’t have to worry about constantly fixing/ pulling the shoulders up. Love the sheer sleeves too. Read more
items.author: Avery Pauley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: The fit was funny on my body type & was slightly too small. It was beautiful though. I’m a size L usually and got a L. Would size up. Read more
items.author: Meridian

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Sizing was perfect & color is a beautiful blue. The dress is super comfortable & has enough stretch. The quality is great for the price point! Read more
items.author: Miss Kayylala

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!
items.body: Absolutely stunning and great value for the price. Wore it to a wedding and I got so many compliments Read more
items.author: Marissa Bufalini

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this! Got so many compliments! Don’t think twice!
items.body: This is a really well made dress! For all shapes and sizes! The ruffling gives a really good shape to any body. It is double layered so it feels high quality and kinda thick but it’s not warm thick. It’s like a cotton layer first and then a mesh layer on top for the ruffling. Read more
items.author: Sam Andres

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder High Split Long Sleeve Split Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder High Split Long Sleeve Split Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Blue, Burgundy, Floral Black Rose Red, Black, Floral Green, Coffee, Floral Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
